verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ve found a friend who is all to me, His love is ever true. I love to tell how He lifted me And what His grace can do for you.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Saved by His power divine, Saved to new life sublime, Life now is sweet and my joy is complete. For I’m saved, saved, saved.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When poor and needy and all alone, In love He says to me, “Come unto me and I’ll lead you home, To live with me eternally.”{/lang-eng}
